input.sentences: today we watched the new guy peel potatoes .
he was actually pretty good at it !
everyone was impressed with how he did .
he even got his favorite band to come play for him because of his success !
just kidding that 's not how working is . he continued his shift .
output.sentences: They cut the skin off all of the potatoes.
They sat down prepared to eat.
While they ate, a band played music.
It was so good, the daughter licked the plate clean.
